mcq.statement: After 1994, under what conditions could the Trusteeship Council meet?

options.b: Only at the request of the General Assembly
options.c: As occasion required by its decision, President, majority of members, General Assembly, or Security Council

mcq.one_liner: After 1994, the Trusteeship Council could meet only as required by its own decision, its President, a majority of its members, or at the request of the General Assembly or Security Council.
